Name: BuddyMove Data Set
Abstract: User interest information extracted from user reviews published in holidayiq.com about various types of point of interests in South India
RelevantInfo: This dataset was populated from destination reviews published by 249 reviewers of holidayiq.com till October 2014. Reviews falling in 6 categories among destinations across South India were considered and the count of reviews in each category for every reviewer (traveler) is captured.
Acknowledgements:
Please cite the below paper while using this dataset
S. Renjith and C. Anjali, 'A personalized mobile travel recommender system using hybrid algorithm,' 2014 First International Conference on Computational Systems and Communications (ICCSC), Trivandrum, 2014, pp. 12-17. doi: 10.1109/COMPSC.2014.7032612
RelevantPapers: S. Renjith and C. Anjali, 'A personalized mobile travel recommender system using hybrid algorithm,' 2014 First International Conference on Computational Systems and Communications (ICCSC), Trivandrum, 2014, pp. 12-17. doi: 10.1109/COMPSC.2014.7032612
AttributeInfo:
Attribute 1 : Unique user id
Attribute 2 : Number of reviews on stadiums, sports complex, etc.
Attribute 3 : Number of reviews on religious institutions
Attribute 4 : Number of reviews on beach, lake, river, etc.
Attribute 5 : Number of reviews on theatres, exhibitions, etc.
Attribute 6 : Number of reviews on malls, shopping places, etc.
Attribute 7 : Number of reviews on parks, picnic spots, etc.
